Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Electromagnetic Shield" to destroy itself does not start a Chain.\n2. Face-down Thunder-Type monsters that are attacked and flipped face-up are protected as well.

PSCT.Base: Level 3 or lower Defense Position Thunder-Type monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle. Destroy this card if you control a face-up Attack Position monster.
